submittedOn.description: The date the foreign income was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

foreignEarnings.description: The container that holds the key value for foreign earnings

customerReference.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the foreign income. Must be between 1 and 90 characters in length.

earningsNotTaxableUK.description: The income received in a foreign country that could not be transferred to UK because of exchange controls. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: Financial details about unremittable foreign income

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in a ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

amountInForeignCurrency.description: The total amount of foreign currency. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amountTaxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on foreign income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
